page.title: 07SCHOOL
page.content: {1915} They went at 9-00 in the morning. There were 108 children in the school and they stayed there until they were 14 and went to work .They had roll-call,prayers, dictation, geography, gardening and religious education and they wrote on slates.They had to stand up and do their reading to the class. They had to go home for dinner except for those children from Pertwood, Knoyle Down and Chicklade which were farther away. { {1925 The school was very cold in winter. The outside toilets froze. They had big stoves. It was a terribly fashioned school.
